name: Software-metrics
body:
### Welcome
The subject of my Master's thesis will be "Automatic refactoring of large units and generating meaningful unit names". In order to accomplish this goal, I will implement utility functions to examine software by measuring metrics and applying software transformations.

The project will be implemented in the [Rascal Meta Programming Language](http://www.rascal-mpl.org/).

To be continued soon...


### Contact
jeroen@peetersweb.nl
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
